---
name: planning-backlog-completed-date
interactive: true
description: Collects or generates the completed date for a backlog item. Use this skill to prompt for or generate the completed date as part of planning workflows. Supports interactive mode for user input.
---

argument-hint:
/backlog-completed-date: |
Parameters: none
Action: Prompt the user to enter or confirm the completed date (if applicable), validate input, and return the value.
Example: /backlog-completed-date
